entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pincher Creek Airport 12:58 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
